tt4919268.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
tt4919268.synopsis: In "Bad Boys: Ride or Die," veteran detectives Mike and Marcus, played by Will Smith and Martin Lawrence, are on the run in Miami. Facing explosive confrontations and high-speed chases, they uncover a web of corruption, testing their loyalty and courage in this high-octane action-comedy.
tt4919268.visual_summary: In a city on the brink, two men arm themselves for a high-stakes mission, facing danger and uncertainty as the sun sets on their final stand. Two veteran detectives reunite for an explosive, high-speed summer adventure, battling crime and chaos in a sun-soaked city. Two veteran detectives reunite for one last explosive mission, navigating danger and humor in the vibrant cityscape of Miami. "Bad Boys" promises action, camaraderie, and high-stakes drama. In a high-stakes thriller, two detectives uncover a web of corruption in Miami, leading to a dangerous confrontation with powerful adversaries. Will they bring justice to the city? In a high-stakes, adrenaline-fueled ride, two determined detectives navigate the dangerous streets, facing intense challenges and uncovering dark secrets. Will they survive the ultimate test of loyalty and courage? In a high-stakes urban thriller, a relentless pursuit unfolds across a bustling cityscape, featuring intense confrontations, high-speed chases, and a gripping narrative of crime and justice. A high-stakes prison break unfolds as a mysterious operative infiltrates a maximum-security facility, setting the stage for an explosive confrontation. Will they succeed against all odds? In a high-stakes aerial battle, two heroes fight off enemies aboard a helicopter, showcasing intense action, teamwork, and explosive combat. Will they survive the mission? In a world on the brink of chaos, elite soldiers battle against time and enemies in a high-stakes mission filled with explosive action and heart-pounding aerial combat. A high-octane thriller unfolds as a mysterious driver races through city streets, leading to an explosive climax. Mark your calendars for June 7. In a high-octane thriller, two fugitives race against time, evading fiery explosions and relentless law enforcement, as they uncover a conspiracy that could change everything. In a high-octane thriller, chaos erupts as a fiery explosion, intense confrontations, and shocking discoveries unfold, pushing characters to their limits in a desperate fight for survival. In a city ablaze with chaos, a man faces a fiery ordeal, battling against time and terror. Will he survive the inferno and uncover the truth? Two veteran detectives reunite for one last explosive mission, facing new threats and old enemies in a high-stakes, action-packed adventure. Will they survive the chaos and save the day? In a high-octane showdown, chaos erupts as law enforcement faces off against relentless adversaries in a battle where "Everybody Versus" everyone. Prepare for an explosive action thriller! In a neon-lit urban jungle, tensions rise as rival factions clash, leading to high-stakes confrontations and thrilling car chases. Will they find peace or descend into chaos? In a neon-lit urban jungle, two determined men navigate a tense confrontation, their expressions revealing a mix of resolve and urgency. The stakes are high, and danger lurks in every shadow. In a neon-lit underworld, a man faces off against a sniper, leading to a chaotic and intense showdown filled with danger and unexpected twists. In a high-octane action thriller, two detectives face explosive confrontations and intense shootouts, battling a formidable adversary in a neon-lit cityscape. Starring Will Smith, this promises relentless excitement. In a high-octane action thriller, two elite operatives face explosive battles, personal dilemmas, and a relentless enemy, all while protecting their loved ones and uncovering a dangerous conspiracy. In a high-octane action-comedy, Martin Lawrence teams up with a fellow cop to take down a dangerous criminal, leading to explosive chases and intense confrontations. In a high-octane action thriller, two seasoned detectives face explosive confrontations and intense battles, pushing their limits to bring justice to a dangerous criminal underworld. In "Bad Boys: Ride or Die," explosive action and high-stakes chases return as the iconic duo faces their most dangerous mission yet. Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled thrill ride! In a rain-soaked, neon-lit city, a police officer battles a monstrous creature in the sewers, leading to a tense underwater confrontation. Will he survive the lurking terror? A determined police officer battles a monstrous creature in the sewers, facing life-threatening challenges in a high-stakes, adrenaline-pumping showdown. In a high-stakes, action-packed sequence, two police officers battle through a flooded, neon-lit facility, facing intense challenges and life-threatening dangers. Will they survive the chaos? "Bad Boys: Ride or Die" promises high-octane action and thrilling drama, featuring music by Black Eyed Peas, Becky G, and El Alfa. Directed by Adil & Bilall, in theaters June 7. "Bad Boys: Ride or Die" promises high-octane action and thrilling camaraderie. Starring Will Smith and Martin Lawrence, this explosive adventure hits theaters on June 7. Get your tickets now! In "Bad Boys: Ride or Die," action-packed scenes and intense camaraderie between two detectives promise thrilling adventures and high-stakes drama. Don't miss it in theaters June 7! Two veteran detectives, played by Will Smith and Martin Lawrence, return for an action-packed, high-stakes mission in "Bad Boys: Ride or Die." Explosive chases and intense shootouts await.

tt11389872.title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
tt11389872.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, a young ape embarks on a perilous journey, uncovering ancient secrets and challenging everything he knows. As alliances are tested and battles rage, he must make choices that will shape the future of both apes and humans. An epic tale of survival and discovery.
tt11389872.visual_summary: In a world where humans and powerful apes clash for survival, alliances are tested and battles rage. Witness the epic struggle in the new trailer. In a post-apocalyptic world, apes rise to power, facing dark challenges and fierce battles to establish their kingdom. "Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes" promises intense action and gripping drama. In a dimly lit room, a gloved hand carefully retrieves an ancient, mysterious book from a shelf, hinting at secrets and dark discoveries waiting to be unveiled. In a world where apes and humans collide, a mysterious book reveals a poignant past, hinting at a future where understanding and survival intertwine. "Rise of the Planet of the Apes" awaits. In a world where apes rise against humanity, witness the epic struggle for survival and dominance. "Dawn of the Planet of the Apes" – the battle for Earth begins. In a world where apes rise to power, a perilous journey through treacherous landscapes unfolds, testing their unity and survival against formidable odds.   "Rise of the Apes: A Battle for Survival" In a lush, forested world, intelligent apes build a complex society, showcasing their unity and strength. A young ape emerges as a leader, hinting at an epic struggle for survival. In a post-apocalyptic world, intelligent apes navigate survival and conflict, forging alliances and battling nature's fiercest creatures. A tale of resilience and unity unfolds against stunning, desolate landscapes. In a world where nature reclaims its dominion, a tribe of intelligent apes rises to power, facing the remnants of human civilization in an epic battle for survival and supremacy. In a world where apes rise to power, alliances are tested, and survival becomes a battle against humanity's last stand. Witness the epic struggle for dominance and freedom. In a post-apocalyptic world, intelligent apes gather under a powerful leader, preparing for an epic battle against human oppressors. The fate of both species hangs in the balance. In a world where apes rise against human oppression, a young chimpanzee leads a rebellion, forging alliances and facing perilous challenges to secure freedom for his kind. In a world where apes rise against human oppression, a powerful leader emerges, rallying his kind for an epic battle for freedom and survival. Witness the dawn of a new era. In a world where apes rise to power, a young ape must navigate treacherous alliances and ancient rivalries to secure the future of his kind. In a lush, dense forest, a tribe of intelligent apes, led by a fierce and armored leader, prepares for an epic battle to defend their territory. In a world where humans are hunted by powerful ape warriors, a group of survivors must outrun their relentless pursuers to reclaim their freedom. Will they escape the jungle's grasp? In a world where humans and intelligent apes clash for survival, a thrilling adventure unfolds. Witness the epic battle for dominance and freedom, coming to theaters on May 10. In a mystical, overgrown world, a lone explorer uncovers ancient secrets and awakens a colossal, vine-covered guardian. Adventure and danger await in this epic journey of discovery. In a world where humans and intelligent apes clash, a young girl and a determined ape form an unlikely alliance to survive the chaos and uncover hidden truths. In a world where apes rise to power, a leader faces moral dilemmas and battles for survival. Witness the epic struggle for dominance and the future of both species. A determined ape navigates a world of danger and intrigue, hinting at a gripping tale of survival and intelligence in a post-apocalyptic setting. In a world where intelligent apes and humans clash for survival, alliances are tested and destinies intertwined. Witness the epic struggle for dominance and freedom. In a dense, perilous jungle, a woman fights for survival against mysterious, armored creatures. Tension mounts as she navigates the treacherous terrain, seeking escape from relentless pursuers. In a world where humans and intelligent apes clash for survival, a woman finds herself caught in the middle of an epic battle. Will she escape the chaos? In a thrilling chase through a sunlit field, a fierce ape on horseback pursues a desperate woman, setting the stage for an intense and action-packed confrontation. In a world where survival is a race against time, a lone woman battles relentless pursuers in a vast, untamed wilderness. No one is safe. In a world on the brink of chaos, an explosive battle erupts as no one can stop the reign of a powerful force. Prepare for an epic showdown. In a post-apocalyptic world, humans and intelligent apes struggle for survival amidst the ruins of civilization, leading to an epic confrontation that will determine the fate of both species. In a thrilling adventure, a daring climber faces perilous heights and mysterious creatures, while a determined woman and her primate allies embark on a dangerous journey for survival. In a world where apes rise against humanity, witness the epic battle for survival and dominance. "War for the Planet of the Apes" – the ultimate showdown begins. In a world where apes reign supreme, witness epic battles, fiery chaos, and the rise of a new kingdom. Experience the spectacle in IMAX. A thrilling cinematic experience awaits! Catch the action-packed adventure in theaters on May 10, and enjoy it in premium formats like Dolby Cinema, 4DX, and Cinemark XD.
